name: Level Clear!
description:
"Level Clear!" is a casual game inspired by Overcooked and made in seven days where you need to clean up rooms as quickly as possible. Pickup and throw books and switch back and forth between the characters and make your way through 7 different levels. 

Controls
  • Rotating: Moving mouse
  • Pick up and drop books: Left mouse button
  • Throw books: Right mouse button
  • Walk: Rotate in the direction you want to go and press W
  • Switch character: Press space, go to another character and press space again
More information
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Graphics: Piksel
  • Music: Cubase
